bibl.title: A New Greek Glossary on Papyrus from Oxyrhynchus.
bibl.note: Entries for kappa and part of omicron-pi. Latter half of the 3rd cent. A.D. "I am inclined to consider this text among the predecessors of Hesychius, and derived from or connected with the Lexicon Homericum of Apollonius Sophista rather than identified with a manuscript of the latter." - Will be republished in the Oxyrhynchus Papyri.
bibl.seg: Cockle Walter E.H., A New Greek Glossary on Papyrus from Oxyrhynchus.

Entries for kappa and part of omicron-pi. Latter half of the 3rd cent. A.D. "I am inclined to consider this text among the predecessors of Hesychius, and derived from or connected with the Lexicon Homericum of Apollonius Sophista rather than identified with a manuscript of the latter." - Will be republished in the Oxyrhynchus Papyri.
